ShortIndexWebSiteDescription: Manage your expenses, plan your future and achieve your dreams with EconoFlow - Your smart partner in personal finance.
ViewYourExpensesSinglePoint: View your expenses from a single point
DescriptionSmartCollaboration: Share projects with others, setting different access levels
DescriptionClearView: Organize your finances in different contexts. Create separate projects for each aspect of your financial life.
DescriptionSimplePlanning: Create monthly budgets and track your financial goals.
Description100Safe: Your data is protected with top-notch encryption.
DescriptionSignUp: Create your account for free in minutes
StartNowYourJourneySubText: Transform your relationship with money. No hassle, no stress.
RegisterAdvice: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Service. For more information about EconoFlow's privacy practices, see the EconoFlow Privacy Statement. We'll occasionally send you account-related emails.
PleaseInformUsAverageAnnualIncomeThisPro: Please, inform for us the average annual income for this project.
ManagePersonalInfoAndPreferences: Manage your personal information and preferences
ReceiveImportantUpdatesNotificationsViaE: Receive important updates and notifications via email
ReceiveRealTimePushNotificationsYourDevi: Receive real-time push notifications on your devices
UpdateYourPasswordSecurely: Update your password and authentication securely
UseStrongPasswordDescription: Combine uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols to create a more secure password.
ChangeRegularlyDescription: Update your password every 3-6 months or whenever you suspect it's been compromised.
DontSharePasswordDescription: Never share your password via email, message or phone. Always keep it private.
EnableTwoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security with two-factor authentication whenever available.
UpdateYourEmailAddress: Update and confirm your email address
PleaseCheckYourEmailToVerify: Please, check your email to verify. Without it is impossible recovery your account.
EmailVerificationDescription: Always check your email after changes to keep your account secure.
ImportantNoticesDescription: Receive security alerts and important account updates.
SecureEmailDescription: Use a private and secure email address to protect your account.
RegularUpdatesDescription: Keep your email updated so you don't miss important information.
WelcomeMessage: Welcome to EconoFlow! Now you can manage your finances in a simple and smart way.
ConfirmEmailMessage: Please confirm your email to activate your account and start using all features.
